intro_cards.title: Enjoy original Fun! Japan contents everyday for free!
intro_cards.description: Great contents that will make you love Japan even more: selected food, popular tourist spots, fashion, anime and more!

intro_cards.title: Community where Japanese lovers gather!
intro_cards.description: Share your stories about food, sightseeing, shopping, entertainment with fellow Japan lovers!

intro_cards.title: Fun! Japan staff will become your friends!
intro_cards.description: Know more about Japan from friendly staff with latest insight on Japan!

intro_cards.title: Lot of benefits exclusive for Fun! Japan members!
intro_cards.description: Get member exclusive benefits: coupon, win gift, event. All in collaboration with Japanese companies.
